indika polkotuwatha්rasthawadaya mulumanin ma parajaya kirima sandaha uparima washayen ki්raya karana me mohothe, uthuru nangenahira sama jana kotasaka ge pa්rajathantha්rawadi ayithiya surakena wadapiliwelak awashya bawin ewani karya bharayakata rajaya awathirnawima athishaya kalochitha bawa malwathu asgiri anunahimiwaru pawasathi.me sandaha idiripath kara athi sarwa pakshika niyojitha kamitu yojana buddhimath wa ha awanka wa adhyayanaya kala yuthu wa atha yi malwathu parshwaye anunayaka niyangoda wijithasiri nahimiyo pawasuha.kruthahastha deshapalanagnyayan wisin idiripath karena arthawath yojana me sandaha upakari kara gatha yuthu wa atha yi da wisheshayen mewani wadapiliwelak magin uthuru nangenahira sinhala demala muslim siyalu janathawa ge ayithin aaraksha wiya yuthu wa athayi da malwathu anunahimiyo pawasathi.me sambandhayen adahas dakwana asgiri parshwaye anunayaka galagama sha්ri aththadassi nahimiyo uthuru nangenahira arbudayata sthirasara wisandumak awashyayi.
